thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 19 of 40
thread.title: Bob Stone

author: Bob Stone
title: Bob Stone
text:
I'v bought three espresso machines from Whole Latte Love, and dozens of bags of coffee beans. They are extraordinarily responsive and helpful. My first machine was a "starter." When I wanted a real super automatic I got educated from their excellent website and from customer reviews. My second machine was a Gaggia, which lasted for 7 or 8 years, using it several times a day. I recently replaced it with another Gaggia machine.
Three or four times over the years I've called WLL with a problem, and every time they helped me put my machine back into operation quickly.
More recently I've found them to be a great source for the Lavazza beans I like, at the best price around.
